item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Wicked Wolf Tavern

Happy Hour specials include

$2 Drinks


This includes:

All Draft Beers

All Call Drinks (jack daniels, captain morgan, absolut, etc.....)

All House Wine

 

Please come see either myself or Ben when you get to happy hour and we'll give you a bracelet that will allow you to enjoy the happy hour drink specials.

Contact: Jeanie (203) 645-9539

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour at Wicked Wolf
